# Components

  • Django (opens new window) – Web Framework Backend
  • Django Rest Framework (opens new window) – Django Rest Web Framework our API
  • PostGIS (opens new window) – Spatial Database extension to Postgresql
  • PGRouting (opens new window) - Routing extension to PostGIS and Posgresql
  • Postgresql (opens new window) – Database
